pages.text: By reinforcing a regular cauldron with $(item)Silver$(), you can create a $(item)Witches Cauldron$().$(br)This magical cauldron is extremely versatile in use and is namely used for $(l:bewitchment:introduction/elemental_oils)$(marked)Oil Crafting$(), $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)$(marked)Brewing$() and $(l:bewitchment:introduction/cauldron#teleport)$(marked)Teleportation$().

Items can be tossed into the Witches Cauldron once it boils. To make it boil, place hot blocks such as $(item)Lava$() or $(item)Magma Blocks$() below it.$(br)Note that the Witches Cauldron often requires $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)$(marked)Altar Power$().

pages.title: Teleportation
pages.text: To teleport with a Witches Cauldron, simply throw in an $(item)Ender Pearl$(), step on it and say your destination.$(br)That destination must be another Witches Cauldron that has been named with a $(item)Name Tag$().$(br)Teleportation requires $(marked)Altar Power$().
